function.name: dryingLevel_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the drying level in a dryer.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the drying level.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to increase the drying level.

dryingLevelDelta.description: The amount by which to increase the drying level.
